channel.title: Summer Duets (Mondays in June)
channel.description:
For the first 24 hours, please only sign up to one of these Summer Duet sessions. Including One Shot, The Tabula Initiative, Clicks & Hums & Sirens & the Sun, Breaking the Ice, and Radio Silence.
[Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N-6xYyx6Qsqkky2e7Jk) - **One Shot** [date=2022-06-06 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-06-06 time=23:59:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] How far would you go to get revenge? The Shooter has been wronged… driven to the ends of yourself and left with only one goal: to get even. Permanently.
[Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N-6xwMGqX760NFqgWK2) - **The Tabula Initiative** [date=2022-06-14 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-06-14 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] Will you uncover the truth about your past with the Tabula Initiative before it reclaims you? What will you sacrifice to chart a new future?
[Sign Up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N-6yLLK7LoPP9E-jTBc) - **Clicks & Hums & Sirens & The Sun** [date=2022-06-20 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-06-20 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] A game about lost love, second chances, and house music.
[Sign Up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N-6yfx96ycUlTPW9cvA) - **Breaking the Ice** [date=2022-06-27 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-06-27 time=23:59:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] In Breaking the Ice, two players tell the tale of the ups and downs of falling in love. Together they take on the roles of a pair of characters going on their first three Dates.
& a bonus game we'll play asynchronously in July!
[Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N-6za_tXbLUKYWi1VBL) - **Radio Silence** [date=2022-07-04 time=22:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-07-04 time=22:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] Radio Silence is a digital romance larp using music to interact instead of your own words. Instead of playing this over VOIP and in a single session, we'll be playing this asynchronously submitting a song each night for two weeks as we build up our conversation.

item.title: Summer Duets (Mondays in June)
item.dc:creator: @Donogh
item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

For the first 24 hours, please only sign up to one of these Summer Duet sessions.
Including One Shot, The Tabula Initiative, Clicks & Hums & Sirens & the Sun, Breaking the Ice, and Radio Silence.

Sign up - One Shot
2022-06-06T19:00:00Z → 2022-06-06T22:59:00Z
How far would you go to get revenge?
The Shooter has been wronged… driven to the ends of yourself and left with only one goal: to get even. Permanently.

Sign up - The Tabula Initiative
2022-06-14T19:00:00Z → 2022-06-14T22:00:00Z
Will you uncover the truth about your past with the Tabula Initiative before it reclaims you? What will you sacrifice to chart a new future?

Sign Up - Clicks & Hums & Sirens & The Sun
2022-06-20T19:00:00Z → 2022-06-20T22:00:00Z
A game about lost love, second chances, and house music.

Sign Up - Breaking the Ice
2022-06-27T19:00:00Z → 2022-06-27T22:59:00Z
In Breaking the Ice, two players tell the tale of the ups and downs of falling in love. Together they take on the roles of a pair of characters going on their first three Dates.

& a bonus game we’ll play asynchronously in July!

Sign up - Radio Silence
2022-07-04T21:00:00Z → 2022-07-04T21:30:00Z
Radio Silence is a digital romance larp using music to interact instead of your own words.
Instead of playing this over VOIP and in a single session, we’ll be playing this asynchronously submitting a song each night for two weeks as we build up our conversation.

Read full topic
